subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hill, a receiver, was a rookie of the year, an all-N.F.L. and Pro Bowl player, and a key contributor to a Chicago Bears team that reached the league’s championship game.
snippet: Mr. Hill, a receiver, was a rookie of the year, an all-N.F.L. and Pro Bowl player, and a key contributor to a Chicago Bears team that reached the league’s championship game.
